# Collagraph ðŸ““

Reactive user interfaces.

> The word [Collagraphy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Collagraphy) is derived from the Greek word _koll_ or _kolla_, meaning glue, and graph, meaning the activity of drawing.

Currently in alpha.
